pullrequest.title: [Gazebo9] Fixing paths related issues on Windows build.

content.raw:
CMake's documentation on `file(TO_NATIVE_PATH ...)` \([https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.14/command/file.html#to-native-path](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.14/command/file.html#to-native-path)\) mentions that:

> Always use double quotes around the `<path>` to be sure it is treated as a single argument to this command.

I think this is necessary to make sure that the path is not truncated if the `${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}` contains spaces, that is not unusual in Windows \(the default `CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX` for example is `C:/Program Files`\).
